title: DeviceTvmSecureConfigurationAssessmentKB
description: JSON Schema for Log Analytics table: DeviceTvmSecureConfigurationAssessmentKB

ConfigurationBenchmarks.description: List of industry benchmarks which recommend the same or similar configuration.

ConfigurationCategory.description: Category or grouping to which the configuration belongs.

ConfigurationId.description: Unique identifier for a specific configuration.

ConfigurationImpact.description: Rated impact of the configuration to the overall configuration score (1-10).

ConfigurationSubcategory.description: Subcategory or subgrouping to which the configuration belongs. Commonly, this describes specific capabilities or features.

RelatedMitreTactics.description: Related tactics from Mitre knowledge base.

RelatedMitreTechniques.description: Related techniques from Mitre knowledge base.

RemediationOptions.description: Recommended actions to reduce or address any associated risks

SourceSystem.description: The type of agent the event was collected by. For example, OpsManager for Windows agent, either direct connect or Operations Manager, Linux for all Linux agents, or Azure for Azure Diagnostics

Tags.description: Labels representing various attributes, used to identify or categorize a security configuration.

TimeGenerated.description: Date and time when the record was generated.

Timestamp.description: Date and time when the record was generated
